subject: Hello World
message:
Hello,

I wanted to share some links with you. Here are a few:

1. Visit our website: https://www.example.com
2. Check out our latest blog post: https://www.example.com/blog/latest
3. Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/example

Feel free to explore these links. Let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
John
